"items_game"
{
	"store_currency_pricepoints"
	{
		"currency_id"
		{
			"___$$$types"
			{
				"number" "1"
			}
			"___$$$regex" "\d+"
		}
	}
	"rarities"
	{
		"rarity_name"
		{
			"___$$$types"
			{
				"string" "1"
			}
			"___$$$regex" ".+"
		}
	}
	"qualities"
	{
		"quality_name"
		{
			"___$$$types"
			{
				"string" "1"
			}
			"___$$$regex" ".+"
		}
	}

			}

		}
	}

	{

			"___$$$types"
			{
				"number" "1"
			}
			"___$$$regex" "\d+"
		}
	}
	"code_referenced_icons"
	{
		"icon_path"
		{
			"___$$$types"
			{
				"string" "1"
				"'icon_path'" "1"
			}
			"___$$$regex" ".+"
		}
	}
	"prefabs"
	{
		"prefab_name"
		{
			"___$$$types"
			{
				"string" "1"
			}
			"___$$$regex" ".+"

					}
				}
			}

						"string" "1"
					}

				}
			}
		}
	}

				}
			}

					"___$$$types"

						"string" "1"

					}
					"___$$$regex" ".+"
				}
			}

			{
				"icon"
				{
					"portrait_key"
					{
						"___$$$types"
						{
							"string" "1"
						}
						"___$$$regex" ".+"
					}
				}
				"model_name"
				{
					"___$$$types"
					{
						"string" "1"
					}
					"___$$$regex" "models/.+\.vmdl"
				}
			}

					}

				}

						}

					}

				}
			}

	"loot_lists"
	{
		"loot_id"
		{
			"___$$$types"
			{
				"number" "1"
			}
			"___$$$regex" "\d+"
			"loot_name"
			{
				"___$$$types"
				{
					"string" "1"
				}
				"___$$$regex" "^(?!additional_drop|escalating_chance_drop_by_rarity|treasure_chest_119_lockless_luckvase_2015|type_name|image|challenge_instance|required_hero|in_game_display_interval|in_game_display_all_teams|slot|items|treasure_rarity_override|item).+$"
			}
		}
	}
	"asset_modifiers"
	{
		"asset_modifier_id"
		{
			"___$$$types"
			{
				"number" "1"
			}
			"___$$$regex" "\d+"
			"asset_modifier"
			{
				"___$$$types"
				{
					"string" "1"
				}
				"___$$$regex" "^(?!name|loc_key).+$"
			}
		}
	}
	"partners"
	{
		"teams"
		{
			"team_id"
			{

				{
					"number" "1"
				}
				"___$$$regex" "\d+"
			}
		}

					"number" "1"
				}

			}
		}
	}
